name: Mr Blue Adventure 2D Game, by Kelvinkit (Clever Games & Toys)
name_original: Mr Blue Adventure 2D Game, by Kelvinkit (Clever Games & Toys)
description:
This is a 2D platform game, Mr Blue need to get the Blue Jewel to Score some points, and Mr Blue cannot touch the Enemy, he can destroy the enemy by jumping up and hitting them from the top.

To control, please use ARROW KEY to control UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, and Double Click UP can do double jump. After Jump, fall down mode can attack and destroy the enemy.

Get all the Jewel and have highest scores if you can !!  Have Fun !! ^_^
